name: Antoinemenini.github.io
body:
Rappels
# Ruby on Rails
## Modèles
### Générer un nouveau modèle
``` bash
$ rails generate model Product name:string description:text
```

Types supportés :
* :binary
* :boolean
* :date
* :datetime
* :decimal
* :float
* :integer
* :primary_key
* :string
* :text
* :time
* :timestamp
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
